sentences.sentence: These ideas rapidly became the new orthodoxy in linguistics.

sentences.sentence: But Old Princeton didn't repristinate every out-dated notion of 17th century Reformed orthodoxy.

sentences.sentence: The orthodoxy on inflation is certainly shifting.
